scripts.console-api:split: rm -r tmp/split && mkdir -p tmp/split && openapi split tmp/console_oapi3.json --outDir tmp/split
scripts.console-api:integrate: mkdir -p openapi/paths/ && cp tmp/split/components/schemas/*.yaml openapi/components/schemas/ && cp tmp/split/paths/*.yaml openapi/paths/
scripts.console:generate-spec: npm run console-api:pull && npm run console-api:convert && npm run console-api:fix-external-schema-refs && npm run console-api:split && npm run console-api:integrate && npm run docs:generate-without-examples
scripts.docs:bundle: npm run docs:generate-examples && npm run docs:generate && python3 scripts/css.py && python3 scripts/far.py && cp -r assets/* dist
scripts.docs:build: npm run console:generate-spec && npm run docs:bundle-spec && npm run docs:bundle
